translations: v．发誓，立誓：郑重地承诺或保证。
· He vowed to take revenge on his enemies.

sentences.sentence: She vowed to be revenged on them all.
sentences.translation: 她发誓一定要报复他们所有的人。

sentences.sentence: She vowed never to speak to him again.
sentences.translation: 她发誓再也不和他说话了。

sentences.sentence: I vowed never to set foot in the place again.
sentences.translation: 我发誓再不去那个地方了。
